CrashHandlerActivity
1. You may be warned that you can\'t install from unknown sources. If so, tap the Settings button in the pop-up, scroll down to the Device Administration subheading, tap Unknown Sources, and OK in the following warning pop-up. You may need to tap the back button at the bottom of the screen to return to the browser and tap the download button again \n\n
2. Tap the Next button in the permissions pop-up that appears after completing download, then tap Install \n\n
3. Once app install completed message is shown, tap Done \n\n
4. Open app from device apps
